title: Write CONTRIBUTING.md guide
description: Document development setup (pnpm install), monorepo structure, running tests, building packages, E2E testing workflow. Include PR guidelines and code style.

title: Implement useEventLayout hook
description: Port conflict resolution algorithm from DaySection (greedy column placement). Sort by priority then start time. Returns columnIndex, totalColumns, width, left for each event. Support alternative algorithms.

title: Create Timeline React component
description: Build Timeline component using core hooks. Renders day/timeline view with time-proportional event positioning. Styled with Timeline.module.css. Support time axis, grid lines, current time indicator.

title: Extract and test timeUtils from PediCalendar
description: Port parseTimeToMinutes, parseEventTimeToMinutes, formatHourLabel, formatDisplayTime from PediCalendar. Include robust error handling and multi-format support. Write comprehensive tests covering 12hr/24hr, edge cases, overnight events.

title: Implement useGridLines hook
description: Generate background grid ticks. Returns major/minor gridlines with positions. Configurable intervals (5min, 15min, 30min, 1hr). Support custom styling per tick type.

title: Setup GitHub Actions CI pipeline
description: Create .github/workflows/ci.yml for PR checks. Run type checking (tsc), unit tests (vitest), linting. Fast feedback on code quality.

title: Implement useTimeProportionalLayout hook
description: Convert time to visual position using configurable scale factor (remsPerHour or pixelsPerHour). Returns top, height in configured units. Support minimum event heights. Handle overnight events.

title: Setup demo Astro application
description: Create demo/ workspace with Astro. Configure astro.config.mjs with React integration. Setup base Layout.astro with navigation. Create env.d.ts for types.

title: Create EventBlock React component
description: Individual event renderer with expand/collapse. Accepts positioning props from layout hooks. Styled with EventBlock.module.css. Support click/hover interactions.

title: Create demo pages for all calendar views
description: Create index.astro (landing), timeline.astro, week.astro, month.astro pages. Integrate Timeline, WeekView, Calendar components. Add view navigation.

title: Add dependency tracking between setup issues
description: Create Beads dependencies: monorepo setup blocks all other work, git setup blocks CI/CD, Vite/Vitest block core implementation, types block hook implementation.

title: Setup Playwright E2E testing infrastructure
description: Create tests/playwright.config.ts with viewport configs (mobile 375x667, tablet 768x1024, desktop 1280x720). Setup global-setup.ts for test environment. Configure baseURL for demo deployment.

title: Extract and test dateUtils from PediCalendar
description: Create formatDateForApi, createLocalDate, normalizeDate, addDays, getWeekStart, getWeekEnd. Make week start day configurable (Monday/Sunday). Write comprehensive tests.

title: Configure Git repository and .gitignore
description: Initialize git repo, create .gitignore with node_modules, dist, .beads/*.db, .env patterns. Setup initial commit structure.

title: Create WeekView React component
description: Build WeekView component with 7-day grid. Use useCalendarState, useEventLayout, useTimeProportionalLayout. Styled with WeekView.module.css. Support configurable week start day.

title: Write E2E tests for auth bypass
description: Create auth-bypass.spec.ts testing: DEV_AUTH_BYPASS flag behavior, test user authentication, access to protected features, auth gate rendering.

title: Implement useEventsMap hook
description: Efficient Map<string, Event[]> storage keyed by date string (YYYY-MM-DD). Include helper methods: addEvent, removeEvent, updateEvent. O(1) lookup by date.

title: Write E2E tests for WeekView
description: Create week-view.spec.ts testing: 7-day grid rendering, week navigation, event positioning in columns, conflict resolution. Capture screenshots at all viewports.

title: Implement useCurrentTimeIndicator hook
description: Calculate current time position on timeline. Returns position (px/rem) or null if not visible. Update every minute. Option to show on current day only or all days.

title: Setup GitHub Actions E2E pipeline
description: Create .github/workflows/playwright.yml for E2E tests. Run on deployment (Netlify/Vercel). Execute all Playwright specs, upload screenshot artifacts.

title: Write E2E tests for month Calendar view
description: Create month-view.spec.ts testing: month grid rendering, date navigation, event indicators, month/year navigation. Capture screenshots at all viewports.

title: Write comprehensive README documentation
description: Document library purpose, installation, API surface (hooks + components), usage examples, migration guide from PediCalendar. Include TypeScript examples and props tables.

title: Create test fixtures and mock data
description: Create tests/fixtures/ with events.json and users.json. Define test user credentials for auth bypass testing. Provide consistent test data across E2E specs.

title: Create Calendar React component
description: Build month view Calendar component. Use useCalendarState for navigation. Styled with Calendar.module.css. Show event indicators on dates with events.

title: Setup Vite configuration for core library
description: Configure packages/core/vite.config.ts in library mode. Setup TypeScript compilation, external dependencies (React), and build output.

title: Implement Vite/React demo repository
description: Create a standalone Vite + React repository that demonstrates plain-calendar usage. Should serve as both a working example and integration test for the library. Linear: ABG-94

title: Write E2E tests for date navigation
description: Create date-navigation.spec.ts testing: today/tomorrow/yesterday navigation, week navigation, month navigation, date selection, URL sync. Test keyboard shortcuts.

title: Implement useTimeAxis hook
description: Generate hour labels for time axis. Returns array of {hour, position, label}. Support configurable intervals (15min, 30min, 1hr). Option to include/exclude edge labels.

title: Generate mock event dataset
description: Create demo/src/data/mockEvents.ts with realistic event data. Cover edge cases: overnight events, conflicts, sparse days, all-day events, different durations. 50+ events across 2 months.

title: Implement useDateCache hook
description: Memoize date objects by string key to prevent unnecessary re-renders. Cache date objects and reuse stable references.

title: Implement AuthGate component with dev flag bypass
description: Create AuthGate component that bypasses authentication when DEV_AUTH_BYPASS=true. Use for E2E testing. Support test user credentials. Render children when authenticated or dev mode.

title: Create core TypeScript types
description: Create packages/core/src/types/ with calendar.ts, event.ts, layout.ts. Define core interfaces: CalendarState, Event, LayoutConfig, TimeRange, etc.

title: Configure package.json for npm publishing
description: Setup packages/core/package.json and packages/react/package.json for npm. Configure exports, types, files, peer dependencies. Add build scripts.

title: Implement useCalendarState hook
description: Core date navigation hook combining useDateManager and useWeekNavigation patterns. Returns selectedDate, currentViewingDate, navigation actions (navigateToToday, navigateToTomorrow, etc), URL sync support.

title: Implement useTimeRange hook
description: Dynamic time axis calculation from event data. Returns startMinutes, endMinutes with configurable padding. Default to business hours (9am-5pm) if no events. Handle overnight events correctly.

title: Write E2E tests for event interactions
description: Create event-interactions.spec.ts testing: event click handlers, hover states, expand/collapse, event details display. Test across all views.

title: Setup monorepo structure with pnpm workspaces
description: Create root package.json with pnpm workspaces config. Setup packages/core, packages/react, demo, and tests workspaces. Configure shared tsconfig.base.json.

title: Write E2E tests for Timeline view
description: Create timeline.spec.ts testing: event rendering, time-proportional positioning, grid lines, current time indicator, navigation. Capture screenshots at all viewports.

title: Setup Vitest for unit testing
description: Configure vitest.config.ts at root. Setup test environment for utils and hooks. Configure coverage reporting.
